t/css/fonts.css.ittf.contents:
$group
    $params &opt

    $if opt.useMaterialIcons

        font-face
            font-family 'Material Icons'
            font-style normal
            font-weight ${opt.materialIcons.fontWeight}
            - For IE6-8
            src url(${opt.materialIcons.baseUrl}/MaterialIcons-Regular.eot)
            src local('Material Icons'),
                \b local('MaterialIcons-Regular'),
                \b url(${opt.materialIcons.baseUrl}/MaterialIcons-Regular.woff2) format('woff2'),
                \b url(${opt.materialIcons.baseUrl}/MaterialIcons-Regular.woff) format('woff'),
                \b url(${opt.materialIcons.baseUrl}/MaterialIcons-Regular.ttf) format('truetype')

        . material-icons
            font-family 'Material Icons'
            font-weight normal
            font-style normal
            - Preferred icon size
            font-size ${opt.materialIcons.size}
            display inline-block
            line-height 1
            text-transform none
            letter-spacing normal
            word-wrap normal
            white-space nowrap
            direction ltr
            - Support for all WebKit browsers.
            -webkit-font-smoothing antialiased
            - Support for Safari and Chrome.
            text-rendering optimizeLegibility
            - Support for Firefox.
            -moz-osx-font-smoothing grayscale
            - Support for IE.
            @ font-feature-settings 'liga'

        - Rules for sizing the icon.
        . material-icons.md-18
            font-size 18px
        . material-icons.md-24
            font-size 24px
        . material-icons.md-36
            font-size 36px
        . material-icons.md-48
            font-size 48px
        - Rules for using icons as black on a light background.
        . material-icons.md-dark
            color rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.54)
        . material-icons.md-dark.md-inactive
            color rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.26)
        - Rules for using icons as white on a dark background.
        . material-icons.md-light
            color rgba(255, 255, 255, 1)
        . material-icons.md-light.md-inactive
            color rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.3)

    $if opt.useFontAwesome            
        font-face
            font-family 'FontAwesome'
            src url('${opt.fontAwesome.baseUrl}/FontAwesome.eot?9h6hxj')
            src url('${opt.fontAwesome.baseUrl}/FontAwesome.eot?9h6hxj#iefix') format('embedded-opentype'),
                \b url('${opt.fontAwesome.baseUrl}/FontAwesome.woff?9h6hxj') format('woff'),
                \b url('${opt.fontAwesome.baseUrl}/FontAwesome.ttf?9h6hxj') format('truetype'),
                \b url('${opt.fontAwesome.baseUrl}/FontAwesome.svg?9h6hxj#FontAwesome') format('svg')
            font-weight normal
            font-style normal
        
        . fa
            display inline-block
            font normal normal normal 14px/1 FontAwesome
            font-size inherit
            text-rendering auto
            -webkit-font-smoothing antialiased
            -moz-osx-font-smoothing grayscale
        
        . fa-link:before
            content "\f0c1"
        
        . fa-pencil:before
            content "\f040"

t/css/gridism.css.ittf.contents:
$group
    -
        - 
        - * Gridism
        - * A simple, responsive, and handy CSS grid by @cobyism
        - * https://github.com/cobyism/gridism
    
    - Preserve some sanity
    . grid
        + .unit
        -webkit-box-sizing border-box
        -moz-box-sizing border-box
        box-sizing border-box
    
    - Set up some rules to govern the grid
    . grid
        display block
        clear both
    . grid .unit
        float left
        width 100%
        padding 10px
    
    - This ensures the outer gutters are equal to the (doubled) inner gutters.
    . grid .unit:first-child
        padding-left 20px
    . grid .unit:last-child
        padding-right 20px
    
    - Nested grids already have padding though, so let's nuke it
    . unit .unit:first-child
        padding-left 0
    . unit .unit:last-child
        padding-right 0
    . unit .grid:first-child > .unit
        padding-top 0
    . unit .grid:last-child > .unit
        padding-bottom 0
    
    - Let people nuke the gutters/padding completely in a couple of ways
    . no-gutters .unit
        + .unit.no-gutters
        padding 0 !important
    
    - Wrapping at a maximum width is optional
    . wrap .grid
        + .grid.wrap
        max-width 978px
        margin 0 auto
    
    -
        - Width classes also have shorthand versions numbered as fractions
        - * For example: for a grid unit 1/3 (one third) of the parent width,
        - * simply apply class="w-1-3" to the element.
    . grid .whole
        + .grid .w-1-1
        width 100%
    . grid .half
        + .grid .w-1-2
        width 50%
    . grid .one-third
        + .grid .w-1-3
        width 33.3332%
    . grid .two-thirds
        + .grid .w-2-3
        width 66.6665%
    . grid .one-quarter
        + .grid .one-fourth
        + .grid .w-1-4
        width 25%
    . grid .three-quarters
        + .grid .three-fourths
        + .grid .w-3-4
        width 75%
    . grid .one-fifth
        + .grid .w-1-5
        width 20%
    . grid .two-fifths
        + .grid .w-2-5
        width 40%
    . grid .three-fifths
        + .grid .w-3-5
        width 60%
    . grid .four-fifths
        + .grid .w-4-5
        width 80%
    
    - Golden section: smaller piece
    . grid .golden-small
        + .grid .w-g-s
        width 38.2716%
    
    
    - Golden section: larger piece
    . grid .golden-large
        + .grid .w-g-l
        width 61.7283%
    
    - Clearfix after every .grid
    . grid
        *zoom 1
    . grid:before
        + .grid:after
        display table
        content ""
        line-height 0
    . grid:after
        clear both
    - Utility classes
    . align-center
        text-align center
    . align-left
        text-align left
    . align-right
        text-align right
    . pull-left
        float left
    . pull-right
        float right
    -
        - A property for a better rendering of images in units: in
        - this way bigger pictures are just resized if the unit
        - becomes smaller
    . unit img
        max-width 100%
        height auto
    
    - Responsive Stuff
    media screen and (max-width: 568px)
        -
            - Stack anything that isn't full-width on smaller screens
            - and doesn't provide the no-stacking-on-mobiles class
        . grid:not(.no-stacking-on-mobiles) > .unit
            width 100% !important
            padding-left 20px
            padding-right 20px
        . unit .grid .unit
            padding-left 0px
            padding-right 0px
        
        - Sometimes, you just want to be different on small screens
        . center-on-mobiles
            text-align center !important
        . hide-on-mobiles
            display none !important
    
    - Expand the wrap a bit further on larger screens
    media screen and (min-width: 1180px)
        . wider .grid
            + .grid.wider
            max-width 1180px
            margin 0 auto

t/css/options-init.ittf.contents:
$group

t/css/prettyprint.css.ittf.contents:
$group

	- ========================================
		- WIZZI PRETTY PRINT
		- s/root/t/prettipint.css.ittf
		- ----------------------------------------
	
	. pln
		color #F1F2F3

	. tag
		color #AAFF00

	. str
		color #EC7600  $$ string content
	. kwd
		color #f79256  $$ a keyword
	. com
		color #66747B  $$ a comment
	. typ
		color #678CB1  $$ a type name
	. lit
		color #FACD22  $$ a literal value
	. mix               
		color #ff0040  $$  mixin call
		cursor pointer
	. tag
		color #8AC763  $$ a markup tag name
	. atn
		color #E0E2E4  $$ a markup attribute name
	. atv
		color #EC7600  $$ a markup attribute value
	. expr
		color #f3e877  $$ a declaration; a variable name
	. fun
		color red  $$ a function name
	. arg
		color yellow  $$ a mixin arg

	. pp-ln
		color #999
	. pp-pln
		color #EEE
	. pp-str
		color #EC7600  $$ string content
	. pp-kwd
		color #f79256  $$ a keyword
	. pp-com
		color #66747B  $$ a comment
	. pp-typ
		color #678CB1  $$ a type name
	. pp-lit
		color #FACD22  $$ a literal value
	. pp-mix               
		color #ff0040  $$  mixin call
		cursor pointer
	. pp-tag
		color #50fa7b  $$ a markup tag name
	. pp-atn
		color #E0E2E4  $$ a markup attribute name
	. pp-atv
		color #EC7600  $$ a markup attribute value
	. pp-expr
		color #f3e877  $$ a declaration; a variable name
	. pp-fun
		color red  $$ a function name
	. pp-arg
		color yellow  $$ a mixin arg

    . code-title::before
        content ''
        position relative
        left -16px
        border-left 2px solid #3391FE

    . code-panel
        margin-bottom 1em
        margin-top 1em
    
    . code-prettyprint
        font-size 13px
        border 1px solid #ddd
        border-radius 3px
        box-shadow 0 1px 3px hsla(0, 0%, 0%, 0.05)
        overflow auto     
    
    . code-prettyprint.source
        width inherit
    
    . code-prettyprint > code
        padding 15px
    
    . code-prettyprint code
        font-size 100%
        line-height 18px
        display block
        background-color #3e383d
        color #cDcEc3
    
    < pre
        background #fff
        padding 0px   
        margin 0
    
    < pre code
        padding 0
        font-size inherit
        color inherit
        white-space pre-wrap
        background-color transparent
        border-radius 0

	< pre.prettyprint
		overflow auto
		$$ background #2B3A42
		background #3e383d
		text-shadow 0 1px #888
		font-family Consolas, Monaco, 'Andale Mono', 'Ubuntu Mono', monospace
		text-align left
		white-space pre
		word-spacing normal
		word-break normal
		word-wrap normal
		line-height 1.5
		tab-size 4
		hyphens none
		< ol
			padding-left 2rem
	
	. L0
		+ .L1
		+ .L2
		+ .L3
		+ .L4
		+ .L5
		+ .L6
		+ .L7
		+ .L8
		+ .L9
		color #777
		margin-left 1rem
		padding-left 1rem
		list-style-type decimal

	# Alternate shading for lines
	. L1
		+ .L3
		+ .L5
		+ .L7
		+ .L9
		background #555

	. prettyprint-js
		background #fff

	# Alternate shading for lines
	. J1
		+ .J3
		+ .J5
		+ .J7
		+ .J9
		background #ddd

	. linenums
		color #fff

	media screen and (max-width: 1028px)

		. pp-pln
			color #FFF

		< pre.prettyprint
				padding 1.2rem
				border-left 5px solid #999
				font-size 2rem
				line-height 3rem
				overflow auto

t/css/cheatsheets/content/cs-1-bar.css.i.contents:
$group
    
	. cs-1-bar
		padding 40px 60px 0px 60px $$ t r b l
		width 100%

    . cs-1-bar-title
        -webkit-font-smoothing antialiased
        text-rendering optimizelegibility
        font-family "Futura PT", -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, "Segoe UI", Roboto, "Helvetica Neue", Arial, "Noto Sans", sans-serif, "Apple Color Emoji", "Segoe UI Emoji", "Segoe UI Symbol", "Noto Color Emoji"
        letter-spacing -0.015em
        line-height 1.125
        color ${mpage.Colors.primary}
        font-weight 800
        transition color 250ms cubic-bezier(0.4, 0, 0.2, 1) 0s

    . cs-1-bar-title-dark

    media (min-width: 750px)
        . cs-1-bar-title
            font-size 3rem

    media (min-width: 1000px)
        . cs-1-bar-title
            font-size 3.375rem

t/css/cheatsheets/content/cs-2-sb-elemen.contents:
$group

    . cs-sb-element
        color ${c_0}
        display block
        font-size 0.8rem
        padding 0.3rem 0 0.3rem 1rem
        < a
            color ${c_0}

    . cs-sb-element:last-child
        border-bottom 0

    . cs-sb-element-label
        text-decoration none
        font-weight 700

    . cs-sb-items
        list-style none
        margin 0
        padding 0
        padding-top 1rem

t/css/cheatsheets/content/cs-2-sb-item.c.contents:
$group

    . cs-sb-item
        padding-left 1rem
        margin-top 1px
        border-left 1px solid ${c_0}

    . cs-sb-item-label
        text-decoration none

t/css/cheatsheets/content/cs-2-sb-elemen.contents:
$group
    $params &el
    
    li
        class cs-sb-element
        a ${el.name}
            class cs-sb-element-label
            href #${el.name}
        ul
            class cs-sb-items
            $hook

t/css/cheatsheets/content/cs-2-sb-item.h.contents:
$group
    $params &item

    li
        class cs-sb-item
        a ${item.title}
            class cs-sb-item-label
            href #${item.title}

t/css/cheatsheets/content/cs-2-sb-left.c.contents:
$group

    . cs-sb-left
        border 0px
        bottom 0rem
        display block
        height 100vh
        top 0rem
        overflow-y auto
        position fixed
        transition opacity 250ms cubic-bezier(0.4, 0, 0.2, 1) 0s
        width 320px
        z-index 9999
        opacity 0
        pointer-events none

    media (min-width: 750px)
        . cs-sb-left
            max-width none
            pointer-events auto
            width 16.5rem
            opacity 1 !important
    
    media screen and (min-width: 750px)
        . cs-sb-left
            height calc(100vh - 6.25rem)
            top 7.25rem

    . cs-sb-left-ul
        display flex
        justify-content space-between
        flex-direction column
        list-style-type none
        transition all 1s ease

t/css/cheatsheets/content/cs-3-item-code.contents:
$group
    
    . cs-item
        display flex
        flex-direction column

    . cs-item-code
        display flex
        flex-direction row
        background-color #434343
        padding 10px
        border-radius 10px 10px 0 0 

    . cs-item-code-label
        color #fefefe

    . cs-item-code-expected
        width 100%
        overflow-x auto
        border-radius 10px
        

    . cs-item-code-ittf
        width 50%
        overflow-x auto
        margin-right 5px
        padding 15px
        border-radius 10px

    . cs-item-code-generated
        width 50%
        overflow-x auto
        margin-right 5px
        padding 15px
        border-radius 10px

$group
    $params &item, &opt
    
    . cs-item
        $if item.expected && item.expected.length > 0
            . cs-item-code
                . cs-item-code-label
                    + expected *.${opt.schema}
                pre
                    class cs-item-code-expected
                    code
                        class ${opt.language}
                        + ${item.expected}
        . cs-item-code
            . cs-item-code-ittf
                . cs-item-code-label
                    + *.${opt.schema}.ittf
                pre
                    class code-prettyprint prettyprint
                    + ${item.ittfPretty}
            . cs-item-code-generated
                . cs-item-code-label
                    + *.${opt.schema}
                pre
                    class  code-prettyprint prettyprint
                    code 
                        class ${opt.language}
                        + ${item.generated}

t/css/cheatsheets/content/cs-3-item-titl.contents:
$group
    
    . cs-item-title
        margin 30px 0 5px 0
        padding-top 10px
        $$ border-top 1px solid hsl(0, 0%, 87%)

t/css/cheatsheets/content/index.css.ittf.contents:
$group
    
    $include cs-0-frame
    $include cs-1-bar
    $include cs-1-content
    $include cs-2-sb-left
    $include cs-2-sb-element
    $include cs-2-sb-item
    $include cs-3-item-title
    $include cs-3-item-code

t/css/cheatsheets/content/index.html.itt.contents:
$group
    
    cs-0-frame()
        cs-1-bar(&opt)
        cs-1-content(&opt)
            $foreach el in cs.elements
                $foreach item in el.items
                    cs-3-item-title(&item)
                    cs-3-item-code(&item, &opt)
        div  
            style margin-bottom: 50px;

    cs-2-sb-left()
        $foreach el in cs.elements
            cs-2-sb-element(&el)
                $foreach item in el.items
                    cs-2-sb-item(&item)

t/css/cheatsheets/content/mc.css.ittf.contents:
$group

    -
    - Main Content (mc)
    -

	# mc-wrapper
		position fixed
		width 100%
		$if debug_css
			border 1px solid blue

	. mc-wrapper-layout
		top ${l_mc_top}px
		height calc(100% - ${l_mc_top + 10}px)

	. mc-wrapper-layout-sub
		top ${l_mc_sub_top}px
		height calc(100% - ${l_mc_sub_top + 1}px)

	. mc-frame-bar
		width calc(100% - ${opt.sb_1_min_w}px)
		height 40px
		background #545f58
		display flex
		flex-direction row

	. mc-frame-bar-item
		color #fff
		padding 5px 20px
		font-size 24px

	$*
    . mc-frame
		display flex
		flex-direction row
		height calc(100% - 40px)
		width calc(100% - ${opt.sb_1_min_w}px)
		overflow auto
		$if debug_css
			border 1px solid red
    *$

    media screen and (min-width: 1000px)
        . mc-frame
            padding-left 18rem
    media screen and (min-width: 750px)
        . mc-frame
            padding-left 16.5rem
            padding-top 6.25rem

	$*
    . mc-sidebar-left
		padding 20px 30px
		$$ height 100%
		$$ still i can't find why i need to subtract these 40 pixels
		height calc(100% - 40px)
		min-width 20rem
		overflow auto
		< ul
			display flex
			justify-content space-between
			flex-direction column
			list-style-type none
			transition all 1s ease
			< li
				border-bottom 1px solid ${c_0}
				color ${c_0}
				display block
				font-size 0.8rem
				padding 0.3rem 0 0.3rem 1rem
				< a
					color ${c_0}
			< li:last-child
				border-bottom 0


    . mc-sidebar-left
        border 0px
        bottom 0rem
        display block
        height 100vh
        top 0rem
        overflow-y auto
        position fixed
        transition opacity 250ms cubic-bezier(0.4, 0, 0.2, 1) 0s
        width 320px
        z-index 9999
        opacity 0
        pointer-events none

		< ul
			display flex
			justify-content space-between
			flex-direction column
			list-style-type none
			transition all 1s ease
			< li
				border-bottom 1px solid ${c_0}
				color ${c_0}
				display block
				font-size 0.8rem
				padding 0.3rem 0 0.3rem 1rem
				< a
					color ${c_0}
			< li:last-child
				border-bottom 0

    media (min-width: 750px)
        . mc-sidebar-left
            max-width none
            pointer-events auto
            width 16.5rem
            opacity 1 !important
    
    media screen and (min-width: 750px)
        . mc-sidebar-left
            height calc(100vh - 6.25rem)
            top 6.25rem

    *$            

	. mc-sidebar-left-title
		display none

	. mc-content
		padding 20px 20px
		width 100%
		overflow scroll

	. mc-pane
		width 100%
		< h2
			font-size 2rem
			font-weight 700
			margin 2rem 0 0 0
		< h3
			font-size 1.4rem
			font-weight 700
			margin 1.5rem 0 0 0
		< h4
			font-weight 700
			margin 0.5rem 0 -3px 0
		< p
			line-height 1.3rem
			margin-bottom 0.5rem
		< ul
			list-style-type disc
			padding-left 2rem

	< input[id^='mc-toggle-']
		display none

	. mc-label-toggle
		display none
		cursor pointer

	. mc-label-toggle-close
		display none

	media screen and (max-width: 1028px)
		# mc-wrapper
			. mc-frame 
				display block
				. mc-sidebar-left
					$$ TODO explain exactly why 160px (that is mc-frame-bar height)
					height calc(100% - 140px)
					margin 10px
					< ul li
						font-size 3rem
						border-bottom 2px solid ${c_0}
						padding 2rem 0
					< ul li:last-child
						border-bottom 0

		. mc-wrapper-layout
			top ${l_mc_top_mobile}rem
			height calc(100% - ${l_mc_top_mobile + 1}rem)

		. mc-wrapper-layout-sub
			top ${l_mc_sub_top_mobile}rem
			height calc(100% - ${l_mc_sub_top_mobile + 10}rem)

		. mc-frame-bar
			display flex
			flex-direction row
			justify-content space-between
			background-color ${c_mc_bg_frame_bar}
			color ${c_mc_frame_bar}
			margin 1rem
			padding 1.5rem 1rem

		$*
        . mc-sidebar-left-title
			display block
			padding-left 0
			font-size 3rem
        *$

		. mc-label-toggle
			display block

		. mc-item-link
			display none

		. mc-pane
			display none
			font-size 1.1rem
			< h2
				font-size 1.6rem
				font-weight 500
				margin 1.5rem 0 0 0
			< h3
				font-size 1.3rem
				font-weight 500
				margin 1.2rem 0 0 0
			< h4
				font-weight 500
				margin 1rem 0 -3px 0
			< p
				line-height 2rem
				margin-bottom 1rem

		. mc-content
			$$ TODO explain exactly why 60px (that is mc-frame-bar height)
			height calc(100% - 60px)
			margin 10px
			padding 20px 40px
		
		. mc-content-title
			display none

		# mc-toggle-toc:checked ~ .mc-frame .mc-sidebar-left
			display none

		# mc-toggle-toc:checked ~ .mc-frame .mc-label-toggle-close
			font-size 70px
			cursor pointer
			display block
			$$ float right
			height 35px

		# mc-toggle-c-intro:checked ~ .mc-pane-c-intro

			# mc-toggle-${concept.id}:checked ~ .mc-pane-${concept.id}
				display block

t/css/cheatsheets/content/tn.css.ittf.contents:
$group

	. logo
        background-color ${c_tn_bg_bar}
		margin-left 1rem
		< img:hover
			background-color ${c_tn_1}
			width ${opt.logo_w}px
			height ${opt.logo_h}px

	# tn-input-toggle
		display none

	. tn-bar

		- We ensure that the navigation stays at the top of the browser window by giving it a position: fixed property. 
			- Setting its width to min-width: 100% will ensure that the navigation spans the full width of the browser window.
		background-color ${c_tn_bg_bar}
		position fixed
		min-width 100%

		. tn-main
			- flex for logo and menu UL
			display flex
			align-items center
			- space-between evenly distributes the child elements within the parent flex container
			justify-content space-between
			padding 0 2%

			. logo
				background-color ${c_tn_bg_bar}
				margin-left 1rem
				< img
					width ${opt.logo_w}px
					height ${opt.logo_h}px
					& :hover
						background-color ${c_tn_bg_logo_hover}

			< ul
				display flex
				justify-content space-between
				list-style-type none
				- width is required for justify-content to take effect
				width 60%
				< li
					display inline-block
					padding 1rem
					font-size 1.6rem
					color ${c_tn_bg_0}
					< a
						text-decoration none
						& :hover
							color ${c_tn_2}

				. tn-pageSelected
					background-color ${c_tn_bg_sub}
					color ${c_tn_bg_bar}
					< a
						color ${c_tn_bg_bar}
						& :hover
							color ${c_tn_bg_bar}

		. tn-label-toggle
			display none

		. tn-label-toggle-close
			display none

		. tn-subPages
			background-color ${c_tn_bg_sub}
			padding 0 2rem
			margin 0 auto
			< ul
				display flex
				justify-content space-between
				list-style-type none
				width 60%
				< li
					display inline-block
					padding 0.4rem
					font-size 1.3rem
					< a
						color ${c_tn_bg_bar}
						text-decoration none
						& :hover
							color ${c_tn_2}
				. tn-subPageSelected
					background-color ${c_tn_bg_bar}
					color ${c_tn_bg_bar}
					< a
						color ${c_tn_bg_sub}
						& :hover
							color ${c_tn_bg_sub}

		. tn-subPages_mobile
			display none

	. mainContent

	media screen and (max-width: 1028px)
		. tn-bar

			padding 2.5rem 0

			. logo
				display inline-block

			. tn-main
				display block

				. logo
					< img
						width 200px
						height 90px
						margin -24px 0

				< ul
					background-color ${c_tn_bg_0}
					display block
					list-style-type none
					opacity 0
					text-align center
					width 100%
					display none
					margin-top 2rem
					< li
						border-bottom 2px solid ${c_tn_bg_bar}
						color ${c_tn_bg_bar}
						display block
						font-size 3rem
						padding 2rem 0
						< a
							color ${c_tn_bg_bar}
					. tn-pageSelected
						display block
						
			. tn-subPages
				display none

			. tn-subPages_mobile
				display block

			. tn-label-toggle
				background linear-gradient( to bottom, 
					\b ${c_tn_bg_0} 0%, ${c_tn_bg_0} 15%, transparent 15%, transparent 35%, 
					\b ${c_tn_bg_0} 35%, ${c_tn_bg_0} 50%, transparent 50%, transparent 70%, 
					\b ${c_tn_bg_0} 70%, ${c_tn_bg_0} 85%, transparent 85%, transparent 100%)
				cursor pointer
				display block
				float right
				height 35px
				margin-top 1rem
				width 35px

		# wrapper
			flex-direction column
			position relative
			margin 10px
			height auto
			width 100%
		
		# wrapper-sub

		# tn-input-toggle:checked ~ .tn-bar

			height 100vh
			overflow-y scroll

			. tn-main ul
				opacity 1
				visibility visible
				display block
				< li .tn-subPages_mobile ul
					margin-top 0.5rem
					background-color ${c_tn_bg_li_mobile}
					< li
						font-size 2rem
						padding 2rem 0

		# tn-input-toggle:checked ~ .tn-bar .tn-label-toggle
			display none

		# tn-input-toggle:checked ~ .tn-bar .tn-label-toggle-close
			color ${c_tn_bg_0}
			font-size 70px
			cursor pointer
			display block
			float right
			height 35px
			margin-top 0.2rem
			width 35px

		# tn-input-toggle:checked ~ #mc-wrapper
			display none

t/css/docs/aside-right.css.ittf.contents:
$group

    . aside-right
        
        padding-top 30px
        
        < h4
            text-transform uppercase
            font-size 14px
            font-weight 700
            padding 0 0 10px 30px
            margin-left -30px
            display inline-block
            border-bottom 1px solid #c00
        
        < ul
            padding-left 0
            & :first-child
                margin-top 0

        < li
            list-style-type none
            < a
                font-size 16px
                position relative
            & .current
                < a:before
                    content ""
                    border-color transparent transparent transparent #444
                    border-style solid
                    border-width 10px
                    width 0
                    height 0
                    position absolute
                    top 0
                    left -30px

            & .current a
                color #f90

t/css/docs/header.css.ittf.contents:
$group

    < header .flexbox
        display flex
        height 50px


    < header
        padding 15px
        background darken(#333, 3%)

        < h1, nav
            display inline-block

        . flexbox
            display flex
            height 50px
            & > * 
                margin auto

        . logo
            display block
            < img
                margin-top -7px
        
        . search .svg-icons
            display none 


    < nav, .meta
        < ul
            padding 0
            margin 0
            white-space nowrap
            display inline-block
        < li
            display inline-block

    . meta ul
        margin-left 10px

        < li
            vertical-align middle

    . main-nav, .meta
        < li
            < a 
                border-radius 5px
                font-weight 900
                font-size 0.75em
                padding 0.5em 1em
                text-shadow none
                text-transform uppercase
                transition all .25s

                & :hover
                    background-color #252525
                    box-shadow inset 0 1px 3px rgba(0,0,0,.5), 0 1px 0 rgba(255,255,255,.1)
                    text-shadow 0 1px 3px rgba(0,0,0,.5)

            & .current
                < a
                    background-color #fc0
                    color #222
                    box-shadow inset 0 1px 0 rgba(255,255,255,.5), 0 1px 5px rgba(0,0,0,.5)
                    text-shadow 0 1px 0 rgba(255,255,255,.3)
    
    . mobile-nav
        padding 0 5px
        < ul
            overflow hidden
            width 100%
            display table
        < a
            float left
            width 100%
            background-color #333
            color #fc0
            text-align center
            text-transform uppercase
            font-size 0.625em
            font-weight 900
            padding 10px 5px
            border-radius 5px
        < li
            display table-cell
            width 20%
            padding 8px 2px
        
        . current
            < a
                background-color #fc0
                color #222
                box-shadow inset 0 1px 0 rgba(255,255,255,.5), 0 1px 5px rgba(0,0,0,.5)
                text-shadow 0 1px 0 rgba(255,255,255,.3)

        - This code is courtesy Ben Balter, modified by Parker Moore for jekyllrb.com
            - http://ben.balter.com/2014/03/13/pages-anchor-links/

    . header-link
        position relative
        left 0.5em
        opacity 0
        font-size 0.8em
        transition opacity 0.2s ease-in-out 0.1s

    < h2:hover .header-link
        + h3:hover .header-link
        + h4:hover .header-link
        + h5:hover .header-link
        + h6:hover .header-link
            opacity 1
            
    media (max-width: 580px)
        < header
            . flexbox
                height auto
            . logo img
                margin-top 0

    media (max-width: 699px)
        . searchbox
            display none

    media (max-width: 768px)
        . main-nav ul
            text-align right
    
    media (max-width: 830px)
        . main-nav
            . show-on-mobiles
                display inline
            . hide-on-mobiles
                display none
    
    media (max-width: 890px)
        . meta
            display none

t/css/docs/highlight.css.ittf.contents:
$group
    < pre, code
        white-space pre
        $$ display inline-block
        margin 0
        font 14px/1.8em Menlo, Consolas, "Courier New", Courier, "Liberation Mono", monospace
        padding 0 0.5em

    - ========================================
        - WIZZI PRETTY PRINT
        - ----------------------------------------
    
    . pln
        color #F1F2F3

    . tag
        color #77f328

    . str
        color #EC7600  $$ string content
    . kwd
        color #f79256  $$ a keyword
    . com
        color #66747B  $$ a comment
    . typ
        color #678CB1  $$ a type name
    . lit
        color #FACD22  $$ a literal value
    . mix               
        color #ff0040  $$  mixin call
        cursor pointer
    . tag
        color #77f328  $$ a markup tag name
    . atn
        color #E0E2E4  $$ a markup attribute name
    . atv
        color #EC7600  $$ a markup attribute value
    . expr
        color #f3e877  $$ a declaration; a variable name
    . fun
        color red  $$ a function name
    . arg
        color yellow  $$ a mixin arg

    . pp-ln
        color #999
    . pp-pln
        color #f1ebeb
    . pp-str
        color #EC7600  $$ string content
    . pp-kwd
        color #f79256  $$ a keyword
    . pp-com
        color #66747B  $$ a comment
    . pp-typ
        color #678CB1  $$ a type name
    . pp-lit
        color #FACD22  $$ a literal value
    . pp-mix               
        color #ff0040  $$  mixin call
        cursor pointer
    . pp-tag
        color #77f328  $$ a markup tag name
    . pp-atn
        color #E0E2E4  $$ a markup attribute name
    . pp-atv
        color #EC7600  $$ a markup attribute value
    . pp-expr
        color #f3e877  $$ a declaration; a variable name
    . pp-fun
        color red  $$ a function name
    . pp-arg
        color yellow  $$ a mixin arg

    < pre.prettyprint
        $$ padding 0.8rem
        $$ border-left 5px solid #999
        font-size 1rem
        overflow auto
        $$ background #2B3A42
        $$ background #3e586d
        $$ margin-bottom 1rem
        $$ text-shadow 0 1px #888
        font-family Consolas, Monaco, 'Andale Mono', 'Ubuntu Mono', monospace
        text-align left
        white-space pre
        word-spacing normal
        word-break normal
        word-wrap normal
        line-height 1.3
        tab-size 4
        hyphens none

        background-color #2b2b2b
        color #fff
        $$ max-width 100%
        $$ overflow-x auto
        vertical-align middle
        border-radius 5px
        box-shadow inset 0 1px 10px rgba(0,0,0,.3), 0 1px 0 rgba(255,255,255,.1), 0 -1px 0 rgba(0,0,0,.5)

        < ol
            padding-left 2rem
    
    . L0
        + .L1
        + .L2
        + .L3
        + .L4
        + .L5
        + .L6
        + .L7
        + .L8
        + .L9
        color #777
        margin-left 0.3rem
        padding-left 0.3rem
        list-style-type decimal

    # Alternate shading for lines
    . L1
        + .L3
        + .L5
        + .L7
        + .L9
        $$ background #013a56
        $$ background #2A3941
        background-color #2f2f2f

    . prettyprint-js
        background #fff

    # Alternate shading for lines
    . J1
        + .J3
        + .J5
        + .J7
        + .J9
        background #ddd

    . linenums
        color #fff

    media screen and (max-width: 1028px)

        . pp-pln
            color #FFF

        < pre.prettyprint
                padding 1.2rem
                border-left 5px solid #999
                font-size 2rem
                line-height 3rem
                overflow auto        

    $*
    media (min-width: 768px)
        < pre, code
            font-size 16px

    . highlight
        + p > pre
        + p > code
        + p > nobr > code
        + li > code
        + li> pre
        + h5 > code
        + .note > code
            background-color #2b2b2b
            color #fff
            max-width 100%
            overflow-x auto
            vertical-align middle
            border-radius 5px
            box-shadow inset 0 1px 10px rgba(0,0,0,.3), 0 1px 0 rgba(255,255,255,.1), 0 -1px 0 rgba(0,0,0,.5)

    . note .highlight
        width 94%
        < pre code
            font-size 0.9em
            background-color transparent
            box-shadow none

    . note code
        background-color #333
        background-color rgba(0,0,0,0.2)
        margin-left 2.5px
        margin-right 2.5px
        font-size 0.8em

    . code-block
        margin 10px 0
        < code
            background none

    . highlight
        margin 1em 0
        width 100%
        overflow auto

    < pre.highlight
        padding 10px 0.5em

    . highlighter-rouge .highlight
        @extend .highlight
        margin 0
    *$

    . highlight-code
        white-space nowrap
        padding 4px
        background-color #2b2b2b
        color #fff
        max-width 100%
        overflow-x auto
        vertical-align middle
        -webkit-border-radius 5px
        -moz-border-radius 5px
        border-radius 5px
        box-shadow inset 0 1px 10px rgba(0,0,0,0.3),0 1px 0 rgba(255,255,255,0.1),0 -1px 0 rgba(0,0,0,0.5)

t/css/docs/base.css.ittf.contents:

t/css/docs/news.css.ittf.contents:
$group
    
    < article h2:first-child
        margin-top 0

    . post-category
        + .post-meta
        display inline-block
        vertical-align middle
        font-size .8em

    . post-category
        display inline-block
        margin-left -30px
        padding 6px 10px 8px
        padding-left 50px
        border-radius 0 5px 5px 0
        position relative
        box-shadow 0 1px 5px rgba(0, 0, 0, .3), inset 0 1px 0 rgba(255,255,255,.2), inset 0 -1px 0 rgba(0,0,0,.3)
        background-color #9e2812
        background-image url(data:image/svg+xml;base64,)
        background-image -webkit-gradient(linear, left top, left bottom, from(#9e2812), to(#6f0d0d))
        background-image -webkit-linear-gradient(top, #9e2812 0%, #6f0d0d 100%)
        background-image -moz-linear-gradient(top, #9e2812 0%, #6f0d0d 100%)
        background-image -o-linear-gradient(top, #9e2812 0%, #6f0d0d 100%)
        background-image linear-gradient(to bottom, #9e2812 0%,#6f0d0d 100%)
        filter progid:DXImageTransform.Microsoft.gradient( startColorstr='#9e2812', endColorstr='#6f0d0d',GradientType=0 )

        & :before
            content ""
            position absolute
            top -10px
            left 0
            border-color transparent #6f0d0d #6f0d0d transparent
            border-style solid
            border-width 5px
            width 0
            height 0

    . post-content img
        max-width 100% 

    . label
        float left
        text-transform uppercase
        font-weight 700
        text-shadow 0 -1px 0 rgba(0,0,0,.5)
    
    media (max-width: 568px)
        . post-category
            padding-left 30px
    
    media (min-width: 768px)
        . post-category
            margin-left -50px
    
    . avatar
        border-radius 3px
        display inline-block
        vertical-align middle
    
    . post-meta
        padding 5px 0
        color #c0c0c0
        font-weight 600
        text-shadow 0 -1px 0 #000
    
    . post-date
        + .post-author
        margin-left 10px
    
    . news article + article
        margin-top -10px
        border-radius 0 0 10px 10px
        border-top 1px solid #555
        box-shadow 0 -1px 0 #2f2f2f

t/css/docs/search.css.ittf.contents:

        position relative
        width 200px

    $include p-grid-1
    $include p-grid-1-item

    $include p-eco-1
    $include p-eco-1-item
    $include p-eco-1-image
    $include cloud-1

t/css/home/content/index.html.ittf.contents:
$group
    
    . css-a2s10c
        $foreach content in mpage.Main.contents
            $foreach panel in content.panels
                $if panel.kind == 'splash'
                    p-splash-1(&panel)
                $elif panel.kind == 'grid'
                    p-grid-1(&panel)
                        $foreach item in panel.items
                            p-grid-1-item(&item)
                $elif panel.kind == 'getstarted'
                    p-getstarted-1(&panel)
                $elif panel.kind == 'eco'
                    p-eco-1(&panel)
                        $foreach item in panel.items
                            p-eco-1-item(&item)
                $elif panel.kind == 'cloud'
                    cloud-1(&panel)
                        $foreach item in panel.items
                            cloud-1-item(&item)

    $include b-0-banner-aside
    $include b-1-promo
    $include b-2-nav-ul
    
    $include b-3-item-li
    $include m-1-header
    $include m-2-nav
    $include m-2-search
    $include m-3-nav-bar
    $include m-3-logo
    $include m-4-nav-bar-group
    $include m-5-nav-menu-item
    $include m-6-li-a-ul

t/css/home/header/index.html.ittf.contents:
$group
    $
        var promo = mpage.Banner.promotion;
    
    a-0-main-header()
        b-0-banner-aside()
            b-1-promo( &promo )
            b-2-nav-ul()
                $foreach item in mpage.Banner.items
                    b-3-item-li( &item )
        m-1-header()
            m-2-nav()
                m-3-nav-bar()
                    $foreach menuGroup in mpage.Nav1.menuGroups
                        m-4-nav-bar-group(&menuGroup)
                            $foreach menu in menuGroup.menus
                                m-5-nav-menu-item(&menu)
                                    $foreach panel in menu.panels
                                        m-6-li-a-ul(&panel)
                                            $if panel.kind == 'grid'
                                                li
                                                    m-7-ul-grid()
                                                        $foreach gritem in panel.griditems
                                                            m-8-li-h3-ul( ${gritem.title}
                                                                $foreach item in gritem.items
                                                                    m-9-li-a( ${item.label}, ${item.href}
                                            $elif panel.kind == 'subgrid'
                                                li
                                                    m-7-ul-grid()
                                                        $foreach gritem in panel.griditems
                                                            m-8-li-h3-ul( ${gritem.title}
                                                                $foreach item in gritem.items
                                                                    m-9-li-a( ${item.label}, ${item.href}

                                            $elif panel.kind == 'bar'
                                                m-7-ul-bar()
                                                    $foreach item in panel.items
                                                        m-9-li-a-bar( ${item.label}, ${item.href}

                                            $elif panel.kind == 'list'
                                                $$ m-7-ul-list( ${panel.title}, ${panel.subtitle}
                                                $foreach liitem in panel.listitems
                                                    li 
                                                        h3 ${liitem.title}
                                                            class css-ocmoim
                                                        ul 
                                                            class css-j7qwjs
                                                            $foreach item in liitem.items
                                                                m-9-li-a( ${item.label}, ${item.href}
                                            $elif panel.kind == 'singleitem'
                                                $$ Nothing to do
            m-2-search()

$group
    @style 
        data-emotion-css ic43bx animation-5yo8zs
        css
            . css-ic43bx
                align-items center
                border var(--theme-ui-colors-grey-60,#635e69)
                border-radius 4px
                box-sizing border-box
                cursor pointer
                display inline-flex
                font-family -apple-system,BlinkMacSystemFont,Segoe UI,Roboto,Helvetica Neue,Arial,Noto Sans,sans-serif,Apple Color Emoji,Segoe UI Emoji,Segoe UI Symbol,Noto Color Emoji
                justify-content center
                transition background 250ms,border 250ms,color 250ms
                line-height 1
                text-decoration none
                background transparent
                border 1px solid transparent
                color ${mpage.Colors.primary}
                width 2.5rem
                height 2.5rem
                position relative
                z-index 2
                transition transform 500ms cubic-bezier(0.4,0,0.2,1)
            . css-ic43bx[disabled]
                + .css-ic43bx[disabled]:hover
                cursor not-allowed
                opacity 0.5
            . css-ic43bx svg
                flex-shrink 0
                margin 0 0.25rem
                transform scale(1)
            . css-ic43bx:hover:not([disabled]) svg
                + .css-ic43bx:focus:not([disabled]) svg
                animation animation-5yo8zs 1s linear infinite
            . css-ic43bx:hover
                background #fcfaff
                color #362066
            . css-ic43bx:focus
                background inherit
            media (min-width: 1000px)
                . css-ic43bx
                    display none
            keyframes animation-5yo8zs
                vendor -webkit-
                keyframe 33%
                    transform scale(1)
                keyframe 66%
                    transform scale(0.8)
            keyframes animation-5yo8zs
                vendor
                keyframe 33%
                    transform scale(1)
                keyframe 66%
                    transform scale(0.8)
    button 
        type button
        aria-expanded false
        aria-label Open navigation
        class css-ic43bx
        @style 
            data-emotion-css 1cgevyx
            css
                . css-1cgevyx
                    width 24px
                    height 3px
                    border-radius 2px
                    background var(--theme-ui-colors-black,#000000)
                    margin 10px 0
                    position relative
                    z-index 1000
                . css-1cgevyx:before
                    + .css-1cgevyx:after
                    border-radius 2px
                    height 3px
                    background var(--theme-ui-colors-black,#000000)
                    content " "
                    position absolute
                    right 0
                    transition transform 250ms cubic-bezier(.68,-.55,.265,1.55)
                . css-1cgevyx:before
                    top -7px
                    width 20px
                . css-1cgevyx:after
                    top 7px
                    width 16px
        span 
            class css-1cgevyx

t/css/_layouts/body-scripts.html.ittf.contents:
$group

	$if opt.useReact
        js https://unpkg.com/react@latest/umd/react.development.js
        js https://unpkg.com/react-dom@latest/umd/react-dom.development.js
        js https://unpkg.com/prop-types@latest/prop-types.min.js

        $if opt.react.useRouter
            js https://unpkg.com/react-router-dom/umd/react-router-dom.min.js
        js /docs/scripts/classnames/classnames@2.2.5.js

	$if opt.useJQuery || opt.useBootstrap
		js /docs/scripts/jquery/dist/jquery.js

	$if opt.useBootstrap
		js /docs/scripts/bootstrap/dist/js/bootstrap.min.js

	$if opt.useUnderscore
		js /docs/scripts/underscore/underscore.js
	
	$if opt.usePrism
		$if isWizziStudio
		    js /docs/scripts/prism/prism.js
		$else
            js https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/prism/1.6.0/prism.min.js		
	
	$if opt.useSplit
		js /docs/scripts/controls/split.js
	
	$if opt.useAce

t/css/_layouts/head-styles.html.ittf.contents:

t/css/_layouts/docs-layout.html.ittf.contents:
$group
    $params &art

    $
        var opt = {
            mainCss: '/docs/styles/docs.css',
            mainJs: null,
        }
        var page = {
            sectionTitle: 'Docs'
        };

    _layouts/page-layout(&opt)

        $$ _includes/header(&page)
        $$ $append body-content
        $include home/header/index
        . doc-container
            . w-4-5
                $hook
            . w-1-5
                . aside-right
                    div
                        style padding-top: 40px;
                    ul
                        $foreach item in wzCtx.Doc.items
                            li
                                $if item.title === art.title
                                    class current
                                a ${item.title}
                                    href ${wzCtx.Params.baseUrl}${item.url}

t/css/_layouts/page-layout.html.ittf.contents:
$group
	$params &opt

    - root layout for wizzi /pages

    head 
		@title ${opt.title}
        meta 
            charset utf-8
        meta 
            name viewport
			content width=device-width, initial-scale=1

		$hook head-styles-0
		
		$include ./head-styles

        link 
            rel preconnect
            href https://fonts.gstatic.com
        link
            rel stylesheet 
            href https://fonts.googleapis.com/css2?family=Raleway:wght@200;400;700&display=swap

        link
            href http://fonts.googleapis.com/css?family=Lato&subset=latin,latin-ext
            rel stylesheet
            type text/css

        @style
		
		$hook head-styles

    body
        div 
            id ___wizzi
            div 
                style outline:none
                tabindex -1
                id wizzi-focus-wrapper
                . main-container
                    $$ $hook body-content
                    $hook
	
		$hook body-scripts-0
		
		$include ./body-scripts
		
		$hook body-scripts

        $if opt.useHighlight
            script
                _ document.addEventListener
                    @ 'DOMContentLoaded'
                    => 
                        param event
                        _ document.querySelectorAll('pre code').forEach
                            => 
                                param block
                                _ hljs.highlightBlock(block)

t/html/prettyprint.css.ittf.contents:
$group

	- ========================================
		- WIZZI PRETTY PRINT
		- s/root/t/prettipint.css.ittf
		- ----------------------------------------
	
	. pln
		color #F1F2F3

	. tag
		color #AAFF00

	. str
		color #EC7600  $$ string content
	. kwd
		color #f79256  $$ a keyword
	. com
		color #66747B  $$ a comment
	. typ
		color #678CB1  $$ a type name
	. lit
		color #FACD22  $$ a literal value
	. mix               
		color #ff0040  $$  mixin call
		cursor pointer
	. tag
		color #8AC763  $$ a markup tag name
	. atn
		color #E0E2E4  $$ a markup attribute name
	. atv
		color #EC7600  $$ a markup attribute value
	. expr
		color #f3e877  $$ a declaration; a variable name
	. fun
		color red  $$ a function name
	. arg
		color yellow  $$ a mixin arg

	. pp-ln
		color #999
	. pp-pln
		color #EEE
	. pp-str
		color #EC7600  $$ string content
	. pp-kwd
		color #f79256  $$ a keyword
	. pp-com
		color #66747B  $$ a comment
	. pp-typ
		color #678CB1  $$ a type name
	. pp-lit
		color #FACD22  $$ a literal value
	. pp-mix               
		color #ff0040  $$  mixin call
		cursor pointer
	. pp-tag
		color #50fa7b  $$ a markup tag name
	. pp-atn
		color #E0E2E4  $$ a markup attribute name
	. pp-atv
		color #EC7600  $$ a markup attribute value
	. pp-expr
		color #f3e877  $$ a declaration; a variable name
	. pp-fun
		color red  $$ a function name
	. pp-arg
		color yellow  $$ a mixin arg

    . code-title::before
        content ''
        position relative
        left -16px
        border-left 2px solid #3391FE

    . code-panel
        margin-bottom 1em
        margin-top 1em
    
    . code-prettyprint
        font-size 13px
        border 1px solid #ddd
        border-radius 3px
        box-shadow 0 1px 3px hsla(0, 0%, 0%, 0.05)
        overflow auto     
    
    . code-prettyprint.source
        width inherit
    
    . code-prettyprint > code
        padding 15px
    
    . code-prettyprint code
        font-size 100%
        line-height 18px
        display block
        background-color #3e383d
        color #cDcEc3
    
    < pre
        background #fff
        padding 0px   
        margin 0
    
    < pre code
        padding 0
        font-size inherit
        color inherit
        white-space pre-wrap
        background-color transparent
        border-radius 0

	< pre.prettyprint
		overflow auto
		$$ background #2B3A42
		background #3e383d
		text-shadow 0 1px #888
		font-family Consolas, Monaco, 'Andale Mono', 'Ubuntu Mono', monospace
		text-align left
		white-space pre
		word-spacing normal
		word-break normal
		word-wrap normal
		line-height 1.5
		tab-size 4
		hyphens none
		< ol
			padding-left 2rem
	
	. L0
		+ .L1
		+ .L2
		+ .L3
		+ .L4
		+ .L5
		+ .L6
		+ .L7
		+ .L8
		+ .L9
		color #777
		margin-left 1rem
		padding-left 1rem
		list-style-type decimal

	# Alternate shading for lines
	. L1
		+ .L3
		+ .L5
		+ .L7
		+ .L9
		background #555

	. prettyprint-js
		background #fff

	# Alternate shading for lines
	. J1
		+ .J3
		+ .J5
		+ .J7
		+ .J9
		background #ddd

	. linenums
		color #fff

	media screen and (max-width: 1028px)

		. pp-pln
			color #FFF

		< pre.prettyprint
				padding 1.2rem
				border-left 5px solid #999
				font-size 2rem
				line-height 3rem
				overflow auto

t/html/cheatsheets/content/cs-1-bar.css..contents:
$group
    
	. cs-1-bar
		padding 40px 60px 0px 60px $$ t r b l
		width 100%

    . cs-1-bar-title
        -webkit-font-smoothing antialiased
        text-rendering optimizelegibility
        font-family "Futura PT", -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, "Segoe UI", Roboto, "Helvetica Neue", Arial, "Noto Sans", sans-serif, "Apple Color Emoji", "Segoe UI Emoji", "Segoe UI Symbol", "Noto Color Emoji"
        letter-spacing -0.015em
        line-height 1.125
        color ${mpage.Colors.primary}
        font-weight 800
        transition color 250ms cubic-bezier(0.4, 0, 0.2, 1) 0s

    . cs-1-bar-title-dark
        color ${mpage.Colors.primaryDark}

    media (min-width: 750px)
        . cs-1-bar-title
            font-size 3rem

    media (min-width: 1000px)
        . cs-1-bar-title
            font-size 3.375rem

t/html/cheatsheets/content/cs-2-sb-left..contents:
$group

    . cs-sb-left
        border 0px
        bottom 0rem
        display block
        height 100vh
        top 0rem
        overflow-y auto
        position fixed
        transition opacity 250ms cubic-bezier(0.4, 0, 0.2, 1) 0s
        width 320px
        z-index 9999
        opacity 0
        pointer-events none

    media (min-width: 750px)
        . cs-sb-left
            max-width none
            pointer-events auto
            width 16.5rem
            opacity 1 !important
    
    media screen and (min-width: 750px)
        . cs-sb-left
            height calc(100vh - 6.25rem)
            top 7.25rem

    . cs-sb-left-ul
        display flex
        justify-content space-between
        flex-direction column
        list-style-type none
        transition all 1s ease

t/html/cheatsheets/content/cs-3-item-cod.contents:
$group
    
    . cs-item
        display flex
        flex-direction column

    . cs-item-code
        display flex
        flex-direction row
        background-color #434343
        padding 10px
        border-radius 10px 10px 0 0 

    . cs-item-code-label
        color #fefefe

    . cs-item-code-expected
        width 100%
        overflow-x auto
        border-radius 10px
        

    . cs-item-code-ittf
        width 50%
        overflow-x auto
        margin-right 5px
        padding 15px
        border-radius 10px

    . cs-item-code-generated
        width 50%
        overflow-x auto
        margin-right 5px
        padding 15px
        border-radius 10px

$group
    $params &item, &opt
    
    . cs-item
        $if item.expected && item.expected.length > 0
            . cs-item-code
                . cs-item-code-label
                    + expected *.${opt.schema}
                pre
                    class cs-item-code-expected
                    code
                        class ${opt.language}
                        + ${item.expected}
        . cs-item-code
            . cs-item-code-ittf
                . cs-item-code-label
                    + *.${opt.schema}.ittf
                pre
                    class code-prettyprint prettyprint
                    + ${item.ittfPretty}
            . cs-item-code-generated
                . cs-item-code-label
                    + *.${opt.schema}
                pre
                    class  code-prettyprint prettyprint
                    code 
                        class ${opt.language}
                        + ${item.generated}

t/html/cheatsheets/content/index.css.itt.contents:

    $include cs-0-frame
    $include cs-1-bar
    $include cs-1-content
    $include cs-2-sb-left
    $include cs-2-sb-element
    $include cs-2-sb-item
    $include cs-3-item-title
    $include cs-3-item-code

t/html/cheatsheets/content/index.html.it.contents:
$group
    
    cs-0-frame()
        cs-1-bar(&opt)
        cs-1-content(&opt)
            $foreach el in cs.elements
                $foreach item in el.items
                    cs-3-item-title(&item)
                    cs-3-item-code(&item, &opt)
        div  
            style margin-bottom: 50px;

    cs-2-sb-left()
        $foreach el in cs.elements
            cs-2-sb-element(&el)
                $foreach item in el.items
                    cs-2-sb-item(&item)

t/html/cheatsheets/content/mc.css.ittf.contents:
$group

    -
    - Main Content (mc)
    -

	# mc-wrapper
		position fixed
		width 100%
		$if debug_css
			border 1px solid blue

	. mc-wrapper-layout
		top ${l_mc_top}px
		height calc(100% - ${l_mc_top + 10}px)

	. mc-wrapper-layout-sub
		top ${l_mc_sub_top}px
		height calc(100% - ${l_mc_sub_top + 1}px)

	. mc-frame-bar
		width calc(100% - ${opt.sb_1_min_w}px)
		height 40px
		background #545f58
		display flex
		flex-direction row

	. mc-frame-bar-item
		color #fff
		padding 5px 20px
		font-size 24px

	$*
    . mc-frame
		display flex
		flex-direction row
		height calc(100% - 40px)
		width calc(100% - ${opt.sb_1_min_w}px)
		overflow auto
		$if debug_css
			border 1px solid red
    *$

    media screen and (min-width: 1000px)
        . mc-frame
            padding-left 18rem
    media screen and (min-width: 750px)
        . mc-frame
            padding-left 16.5rem
            padding-top 6.25rem

	$*
    . mc-sidebar-left
		padding 20px 30px
		$$ height 100%
		$$ still i can't find why i need to subtract these 40 pixels
		height calc(100% - 40px)
		min-width 20rem
		overflow auto
		< ul
			display flex
			justify-content space-between
			flex-direction column
			list-style-type none
			transition all 1s ease
			< li
				border-bottom 1px solid ${c_0}
				color ${c_0}
				display block
				font-size 0.8rem
				padding 0.3rem 0 0.3rem 1rem
				< a
					color ${c_0}
			< li:last-child
				border-bottom 0


    . mc-sidebar-left
        border 0px
        bottom 0rem
        display block
        height 100vh
        top 0rem
        overflow-y auto
        position fixed
        transition opacity 250ms cubic-bezier(0.4, 0, 0.2, 1) 0s
        width 320px
        z-index 9999
        opacity 0
        pointer-events none

		< ul
			display flex
			justify-content space-between
			flex-direction column
			list-style-type none
			transition all 1s ease
			< li
				border-bottom 1px solid ${c_0}
				color ${c_0}
				display block
				font-size 0.8rem
				padding 0.3rem 0 0.3rem 1rem
				< a
					color ${c_0}
			< li:last-child
				border-bottom 0

    media (min-width: 750px)
        . mc-sidebar-left
            max-width none
            pointer-events auto
            width 16.5rem
            opacity 1 !important
    
    media screen and (min-width: 750px)
        . mc-sidebar-left
            height calc(100vh - 6.25rem)
            top 6.25rem

    *$            

	. mc-sidebar-left-title
		display none

	. mc-content
		padding 20px 20px
		width 100%
		overflow scroll

	. mc-pane
		width 100%
		< h2
			font-size 2rem
			font-weight 700
			margin 2rem 0 0 0
		< h3
			font-size 1.4rem
			font-weight 700
			margin 1.5rem 0 0 0
		< h4
			font-weight 700
			margin 0.5rem 0 -3px 0
		< p
			line-height 1.3rem
			margin-bottom 0.5rem
		< ul
			list-style-type disc
			padding-left 2rem

	< input[id^='mc-toggle-']
		display none

	. mc-label-toggle
		display none
		cursor pointer

	. mc-label-toggle-close
		display none

	media screen and (max-width: 1028px)
		# mc-wrapper
			. mc-frame 
				display block
				. mc-sidebar-left
					$$ TODO explain exactly why 160px (that is mc-frame-bar height)
					height calc(100% - 140px)
					margin 10px
					< ul li
						font-size 3rem
						border-bottom 2px solid ${c_0}
						padding 2rem 0
					< ul li:last-child
						border-bottom 0

		. mc-wrapper-layout
			top ${l_mc_top_mobile}rem
			height calc(100% - ${l_mc_top_mobile + 1}rem)

		. mc-wrapper-layout-sub
			top ${l_mc_sub_top_mobile}rem
			height calc(100% - ${l_mc_sub_top_mobile + 10}rem)

		. mc-frame-bar
			display flex
			flex-direction row
			justify-content space-between
			background-color ${c_mc_bg_frame_bar}
			color ${c_mc_frame_bar}
			margin 1rem
			padding 1.5rem 1rem

		$*
        . mc-sidebar-left-title
			display block
			padding-left 0
			font-size 3rem
        *$

		. mc-label-toggle
			display block

		. mc-item-link
			display none

		. mc-pane
			display none
			font-size 1.1rem
			< h2
				font-size 1.6rem
				font-weight 500
				margin 1.5rem 0 0 0
			< h3
				font-size 1.3rem
				font-weight 500
				margin 1.2rem 0 0 0
			< h4
				font-weight 500
				margin 1rem 0 -3px 0
			< p
				line-height 2rem
				margin-bottom 1rem

		. mc-content
			$$ TODO explain exactly why 60px (that is mc-frame-bar height)
			height calc(100% - 60px)
			margin 10px
			padding 20px 40px
		
		. mc-content-title
			display none

		# mc-toggle-toc:checked ~ .mc-frame .mc-sidebar-left
			display none

		# mc-toggle-toc:checked ~ .mc-frame .mc-label-toggle-close
			font-size 70px
			cursor pointer
			display block
			$$ float right
			height 35px
			$$ margin-top -0.7rem
			width 35px


		$*

		# mc-toggle-c-intro:checked ~ .mc-pane-c-intro
			display block


		$foreach concept in docs.concepts
			# mc-toggle-${concept.id}:checked ~ .mc-pane-${concept.id}
				display block

		*$

t/html/cheatsheets/content/tn.css.ittf.contents:
$group

	. logo
        background-color ${c_tn_bg_bar}
		margin-left 1rem
		< img:hover
			background-color ${c_tn_1}
			width ${opt.logo_w}px
			height ${opt.logo_h}px

	# tn-input-toggle
		display none

	. tn-bar

		- We ensure that the navigation stays at the top of the browser window by giving it a position: fixed property. 
			- Setting its width to min-width: 100% will ensure that the navigation spans the full width of the browser window.
		background-color ${c_tn_bg_bar}
		position fixed
		min-width 100%

		. tn-main
			- flex for logo and menu UL
			display flex
			align-items center
			- space-between evenly distributes the child elements within the parent flex container
			justify-content space-between
			padding 0 2%

			. logo
				background-color ${c_tn_bg_bar}
				margin-left 1rem
				< img
					width ${opt.logo_w}px
					height ${opt.logo_h}px
					& :hover
						background-color ${c_tn_bg_logo_hover}

			< ul
				display flex
				justify-content space-between
				list-style-type none
				- width is required for justify-content to take effect
				width 60%
				< li
					display inline-block
					padding 1rem
					font-size 1.6rem
					color ${c_tn_bg_0}
					< a
						text-decoration none
						& :hover
							color ${c_tn_2}

				. tn-pageSelected
					background-color ${c_tn_bg_sub}
					color ${c_tn_bg_bar}
					< a
						color ${c_tn_bg_bar}
						& :hover
							color ${c_tn_bg_bar}

		. tn-label-toggle
			display none

		. tn-label-toggle-close
			display none

		. tn-subPages
			background-color ${c_tn_bg_sub}
			padding 0 2rem
			margin 0 auto
			< ul
				display flex
				justify-content space-between
				list-style-type none
				width 60%
				< li
					display inline-block
					padding 0.4rem
					font-size 1.3rem
					< a
						color ${c_tn_bg_bar}
						text-decoration none
						& :hover
							color ${c_tn_2}
				. tn-subPageSelected
					background-color ${c_tn_bg_bar}
					color ${c_tn_bg_bar}
					< a
						color ${c_tn_bg_sub}
						& :hover
							color ${c_tn_bg_sub}

		. tn-subPages_mobile
			display none

	. mainContent

	media screen and (max-width: 1028px)
		. tn-bar

			padding 2.5rem 0

			. logo
				display inline-block

			. tn-main
				display block

				. logo
					< img
						width 200px
						height 90px
						margin -24px 0

				< ul
					background-color ${c_tn_bg_0}
					display block
					list-style-type none
					opacity 0
					text-align center
					width 100%
					display none
					margin-top 2rem
					< li
						border-bottom 2px solid ${c_tn_bg_bar}
						color ${c_tn_bg_bar}
						display block
						font-size 3rem
						padding 2rem 0
						< a
							color ${c_tn_bg_bar}
					. tn-pageSelected
						display block
						
			. tn-subPages
				display none

			. tn-subPages_mobile
				display block

			. tn-label-toggle
				background linear-gradient( to bottom, 
					\b ${c_tn_bg_0} 0%, ${c_tn_bg_0} 15%, transparent 15%, transparent 35%, 
					\b ${c_tn_bg_0} 35%, ${c_tn_bg_0} 50%, transparent 50%, transparent 70%, 
					\b ${c_tn_bg_0} 70%, ${c_tn_bg_0} 85%, transparent 85%, transparent 100%)
				cursor pointer
				display block
				float right
				height 35px
				margin-top 1rem
				width 35px

		# wrapper
			flex-direction column
			position relative
			margin 10px
			height auto
			width 100%
		
		# wrapper-sub

		# tn-input-toggle:checked ~ .tn-bar

			height 100vh
			overflow-y scroll

			. tn-main ul
				opacity 1
				visibility visible
				display block
				< li .tn-subPages_mobile ul
					margin-top 0.5rem
					background-color ${c_tn_bg_li_mobile}
					< li
						font-size 2rem
						padding 2rem 0

		# tn-input-toggle:checked ~ .tn-bar .tn-label-toggle
			display none

		# tn-input-toggle:checked ~ .tn-bar .tn-label-toggle-close
			color ${c_tn_bg_0}
			font-size 70px
			cursor pointer
			display block
			float right
			height 35px
			margin-top 0.2rem
			width 35px

		# tn-input-toggle:checked ~ #mc-wrapper
			display none

t/html/home/content/index.html.ittf.contents:
$group
    
    . css-a2s10c
        $foreach content in mpage.Main.contents
            $foreach panel in content.panels
                $if panel.kind == 'splash'
                    p-splash-1(&panel)
                $elif panel.kind == 'grid'
                    p-grid-1(&panel)
                        $foreach item in panel.items
                            p-grid-1-item(&item)
                $elif panel.kind == 'getstarted'
                    p-getstarted-1(&panel)
                $elif panel.kind == 'eco'
                    p-eco-1(&panel)
                        $foreach item in panel.items
                            p-eco-1-item(&item)
                $elif panel.kind == 'cloud'
                    cloud-1(&panel)
                        $foreach item in panel.items
                            cloud-1-item(&item)

t/html/home/header/index.css.ittf.contents:
$group

    $include a-0-main-header
    $include b-0-banner-aside
    $include b-1-promo
    $include b-2-nav-ul
    
    $include b-3-item-li
    $include m-1-header
    $include m-2-nav
    $include m-2-search
    $include m-3-nav-bar
    $include m-3-logo
    $include m-4-nav-bar-group
    $include m-5-nav-menu-item
    $include m-6-li-a-ul
    $include m-7-ul-grid
    $include m-7-ul-list

t/html/home/header/index.html.ittf.contents:
$group
    $
        var promo = mpage.Banner.promotion;
    
    a-0-main-header()
        b-0-banner-aside()
            b-1-promo( &promo )
            b-2-nav-ul()
                $foreach item in mpage.Banner.items
                    b-3-item-li( &item )
        m-1-header()
            m-2-nav()
                m-3-nav-bar()
                    $foreach menuGroup in mpage.Nav1.menuGroups
                        m-4-nav-bar-group(&menuGroup)
                            $foreach menu in menuGroup.menus
                                m-5-nav-menu-item(&menu)
                                    $foreach panel in menu.panels
                                        m-6-li-a-ul(&panel)
                                            $if panel.kind == 'grid'
                                                li
                                                    m-7-ul-grid()
                                                        $foreach gritem in panel.griditems
                                                            m-8-li-h3-ul( ${gritem.title}
                                                                $foreach item in gritem.items
                                                                    m-9-li-a( ${item.label}, ${item.href}
                                            $elif panel.kind == 'subgrid'
                                                li
                                                    m-7-ul-grid()
                                                        $foreach gritem in panel.griditems
                                                            m-8-li-h3-ul( ${gritem.title}
                                                                $foreach item in gritem.items
                                                                    m-9-li-a( ${item.label}, ${item.href}

                                            $elif panel.kind == 'bar'
                                                m-7-ul-bar()
                                                    $foreach item in panel.items
                                                        m-9-li-a-bar( ${item.label}, ${item.href}

                                            $elif panel.kind == 'list'
                                                $$ m-7-ul-list( ${panel.title}, ${panel.subtitle}
                                                $foreach liitem in panel.listitems
                                                    li 
                                                        h3 ${liitem.title}
                                                            class css-ocmoim
                                                        ul 
                                                            class css-j7qwjs
                                                            $foreach item in liitem.items
                                                                m-9-li-a( ${item.label}, ${item.href}
                                            $elif panel.kind == 'singleitem'
                                                $$ Nothing to do
            m-2-search()

t/html/home/header/notyet/m-3-button.htm.contents:
$group
    @style 
        data-emotion-css ic43bx animation-5yo8zs
        css
            . css-ic43bx
                align-items center
                border var(--theme-ui-colors-grey-60,#635e69)
                border-radius 4px
                box-sizing border-box
                cursor pointer
                display inline-flex
                font-family -apple-system,BlinkMacSystemFont,Segoe UI,Roboto,Helvetica Neue,Arial,Noto Sans,sans-serif,Apple Color Emoji,Segoe UI Emoji,Segoe UI Symbol,Noto Color Emoji
                justify-content center
                transition background 250ms,border 250ms,color 250ms
                line-height 1
                text-decoration none
                background transparent
                border 1px solid transparent
                color ${mpage.Colors.primary}
                width 2.5rem
                height 2.5rem
                position relative
                z-index 2
                transition transform 500ms cubic-bezier(0.4,0,0.2,1)
            . css-ic43bx[disabled]
                + .css-ic43bx[disabled]:hover
                cursor not-allowed
                opacity 0.5
            . css-ic43bx svg
                flex-shrink 0
                margin 0 0.25rem
                transform scale(1)
            . css-ic43bx:hover:not([disabled]) svg
                + .css-ic43bx:focus:not([disabled]) svg
                animation animation-5yo8zs 1s linear infinite
            . css-ic43bx:hover
                background #fcfaff
                color #362066
            . css-ic43bx:focus
                background inherit
            media (min-width: 1000px)
                . css-ic43bx
                    display none
            keyframes animation-5yo8zs
                vendor -webkit-
                keyframe 33%
                    transform scale(1)
                keyframe 66%
                    transform scale(0.8)
            keyframes animation-5yo8zs
                vendor
                keyframe 33%
                    transform scale(1)
                keyframe 66%
                    transform scale(0.8)
    button 
        type button
        aria-expanded false
        aria-label Open navigation
        class css-ic43bx
        @style 
            data-emotion-css 1cgevyx
            css
                . css-1cgevyx
                    width 24px
                    height 3px
                    border-radius 2px
                    background var(--theme-ui-colors-black,#000000)
                    margin 10px 0
                    position relative
                    z-index 1000
                . css-1cgevyx:before
                    + .css-1cgevyx:after
                    border-radius 2px
                    height 3px
                    background var(--theme-ui-colors-black,#000000)
                    content " "
                    position absolute
                    right 0
                    transition transform 250ms cubic-bezier(.68,-.55,.265,1.55)
                . css-1cgevyx:before
                    top -7px
                    width 20px
                . css-1cgevyx:after
                    top 7px
                    width 16px
        span 
            class css-1cgevyx

t/html/layouts/std-layout.html.ittf.contents:

    body

t/html/_layouts/body-scripts.html.ittf.contents:
$group

	$if opt.useReact
        js https://unpkg.com/react@latest/umd/react.development.js
        js https://unpkg.com/react-dom@latest/umd/react-dom.development.js
        js https://unpkg.com/prop-types@latest/prop-types.min.js
        js https://unpkg.com/@material-ui/core/umd/material-ui.development.js
        js https://unpkg.com/babel-standalone@latest/babel.min.js
        $if opt.react.useRouter
            js https://unpkg.com/react-router-dom/umd/react-router-dom.min.js
        js /docs/scripts/classnames/classnames@2.2.5.js

	$if opt.useJQuery || opt.useBootstrap
		js /docs/scripts/jquery/dist/jquery.js

	$if opt.useBootstrap
		js /docs/scripts/bootstrap/dist/js/bootstrap.min.js

	$if opt.useUnderscore
		js /docs/scripts/underscore/underscore.js
	
	$if opt.usePrism
		$if isWizziStudio
		    js /docs/scripts/prism/prism.js
		$else
            js https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/prism/1.6.0/prism.min.js		
	
	$if opt.useSplit
		js /docs/scripts/controls/split.js
	
	$if opt.useAce
		js /docs/scripts/ace/src-noconflict/ace.js

    $if opt.useHighlight
        js https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/highlight.js/10.5.0/highlight.min.js

	$if opt.useCodemirror
        js /docs/scripts/codemirror/lib/codemirror.js
		js /docs/scripts/codemirror/mode/javascript/javascript.js
		js /docs/scripts/codemirror/mode/yaml/yaml.js
		js /docs/scripts/codemirror/addon/display/fullscreen.js

    $if opt.usePubSub
        js /docs/scripts/pubsub/pubsub.js

    $if opt.useAxios
        js /docs/scripts/axios/axios.js

	$if opt.useJss
        js /docs/scripts/jss/jss.js
		js /docs/scripts/jss/jss-preset-default.js

    $if opt.mainJs && opt.mainJs.length > 0
        $if opt.useReact
            script
                src ${opt.mainJs}
                type text/babel         
        $else
            js ${opt.mainJs}

            var fontAwesomeKey = 'eab461efef';
        script
            src https://kit.fontawesome.com/${fontAwesomeKey}.js

t/html/_layouts/docs-layout.html.ittf.contents:
$group
    $params &art

    $
        var opt = {
            mainCss: '/~-/docs/styles/main.css?context=mpage;home.model',
            mainJs: null,
        }
        var page = {
            sectionTitle: 'Docs'
        };

    html/_layouts/page-layout(&opt)

        $$ _includes/header(&page)
        $$ $append body-content
        $include html/home/header/index
        . doc-container
            . w-4-5
                $hook
            . w-1-5
                . aside-right
                    div
                        style padding-top: 40px;
                    ul
                        $foreach item in wzCtx.Doc.items
                            li
                                $if item.title === art.title
                                    class current
                                a ${item.title}
                                    href ${wzCtx.Params.baseUrl}${item.url}

t/html/_layouts/page-layout.css.ittf.contents:
$group

    $include __reset

    < body
        font-family raleway

    . main-container
        background ${mpage.Colors.themeBack}
        position relative

t/html/_layouts/page-layout.html.ittf.contents:
$group
	$params &opt

    - root layout for wizzi /pages

    head 
		@title ${opt.title}
        meta 
            charset utf-8
        meta 
            name viewport
			content width=device-width, initial-scale=1

		$hook head-styles-0
		
		$include ./head-styles

        link 
            rel preconnect
            href https://fonts.gstatic.com
        link
            rel stylesheet 
            href https://fonts.googleapis.com/css2?family=Raleway:wght@200;400;700&display=swap

        link
            href http://fonts.googleapis.com/css?family=Lato&subset=latin,latin-ext
            rel stylesheet
            type text/css

        @style
		
		$hook head-styles

    body
        div 
            id ___wizzi
            div 
                style outline:none
                tabindex -1
                id wizzi-focus-wrapper
                . main-container
                    $$ $hook body-content
                    $hook
	
		$hook body-scripts-0
		
		$include ./body-scripts
		
		$hook body-scripts

        $if opt.useHighlight
            script
                _ document.addEventListener
                    @ 'DOMContentLoaded'
                    => 
                        param event
                        _ document.querySelectorAll('pre code').forEach
                            => 
                                param block
                                _ hljs.highlightBlock(block)

t/json/common/banner.json.ittf.contents:
$group
    $params &ctx
    { Banner
        { promotion
            title "The Future Web is Here:"
            subtitle "Join us at WizziConf! "
            { link
                label "Register for free now."
                href "https://wizziconf.com/"
        [ items
            $if ctx.page == 'docs'
                {
                    label "Wizzi Cloud"
                    href "/docs/cloud/"
            {
                label "Github"
                href "https://github.com/stfnbssl/wizzi"
            {
                label "Support"
                href "${wzCtx.Params.baseUrl}//support/"
            {
                label "Contact"
                href "${wzCtx.Params.baseUrl}//contact/"
            {
                label "Login"
                href "${wzCtx.Params.baseUrl}/login/"
